mapper.insert: insert into follow(fol_type, follower, following) values (#{fol_type}, #{follower}, #{following})
mapper.delete: delete from follow where follower = #{follower} and following = #{following} and fol_type=#{fol_type}
mapper.select: select count(*) from follow where follower =#{index} and fol_type =#{type}
select * from follow where follower = #{index} and fol_type =#{type}
select * from follow where following = #{index} and fol_type =#{type}
